root.name: Fill holes in ROI
root.description: Fills the holes in all the ROI of the active sequence (also works in Protocols).
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.1.3.0 Date 2015-03-19 00:21:54
Fixed incorrect Z/T/C values in processed ROI
- Version 1.1.2.0 Date 2014-05-13 19:07:33
Fixed issue causing the number of ROI to grow at each protocol run
- Version 1.1.1.2 Date 2014-05-12 22:45:04
Fixed class name again!!
- Version 1.1.1.1 Date 2014-05-12 22:41:49
Fixed issue in the class name
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2014-05-12 22:33:31
Adjusted package name (seemed to cause updating issues)
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2014-05-12 21:30:22
* Updated to Icy 1.4.3.5 * Moved to a new package (without breaking backward compatibility)
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-07-03 10:00:45
Handle dummy cases (no sequence opened)
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2013-05-30 15:40:20
